meanings.sent1: The leaves were appressed to the tree trunk.
meanings.sent2: The cat's fur was appressed against its body in the cold weather.
meanings.sent3: The sticker was appressed so tightly, it was hard to peel off.
meanings.sent4: Her lips were appressed in a thin line, showing her disapproval.
meanings.sent5: The book was appressed firmly between the heavy volumes on the shelf.

meanings.definition: Lying flat or close against something
meanings.sent1: The appressed carpet felt smooth under our feet.
meanings.sent2: The appressed blanket kept us warm during the chilly night.
meanings.sent3: The appressed paper clung to the wall with static electricity.
meanings.sent4: The appressed hair on the dog's back made it look sleek and shiny.
meanings.sent5: The appressed fabric hugged her body, accentuating her figure.
